title: tirunAmam karuda
sahitya:
tirunAmam karuda ini orupOdum maravEn tirupparankunram sirakkum murugA un


anupallavi

  peru vAzhvinai inda pirappinil peravum piravAmal irukkum peru pEru peravum


caraNam    ariyAmaik-kuraiyAlum siriyOrin uravAlum sariyAna neriyai nAn kuriyAgak-koLLAmal
peridAga pizhai pala purinda bhEdamaikkenna parivODu mannikkum paDikkunnaip-pOTri
